		read	pread	write	pwrite
Ext2-4-bb	1863	1845	1466	1604
Quill-4-bb	949	9529	897	8090
Quill-opt-4-bb	1757	12614	1659	10138

Ext2-4		9103	8737	5709	5613
Quill-4		1608	10610	1532	5077
Quill-opt-4	2584	10566	2693	10946

PMFS-4		10598	10608	6697	6687
